page.title: 17TOURISM
page.content: Next to the 'Percy Hobbs' is the {MORN {HILL CARAVAN SITE.}This is a pleasant well kept site and an ideal base for tourists wishing to visit the many historical sites in Winchester. The site is well laid out and is 9 acres in extent with pitches for 150 caravans. According to the "A.A. Caravan Guide" it has an'excellent environment with good facilities'. A visit to the site confirms this. There are 16 toilets and 8 shower units. As well as Winchester,tourists can enjoy the surrounding countryside and soak up the rural charm of nearby Avington (with its suberb Georgian Church) and Easton.The 'Percy Hobbs' is a convenient facility for the caravaners. The site is usually fully booked from May to October.It is a British Caravan Club Site.
